</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox  </value></part><part><name>GROUP3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if auto-scroll should move back to start after it reaches the end.
<br><br>
Autorscroll is available for [[DialogControls-ListBoxes|CT_LISTBOX]] and [[CT_CONTROLS_GROUP]] types of controls only. Autoscroll will wait [[ctrlAutoScrollDelay]] seconds (must be  > 0) and then will scroll the scroll bar down to the bottom. [[ctrlAutoScrollSpeed]] defines the speed with which scrollbar is scrolled. If [[ctrlAutoScrollRewind]] is [[true]], the control will fade out, immediately rewind to the top, then fade in, wait [[ctrlAutoScrollDelay]] seconds and then repeat the scrolling in a loop. If user focuses on the control, autoscrolling is interrupted. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlAutoScrollRewind''' control </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] - [[DialogControls-ListBoxes|CT_LISTBOX]] or [[CT_CONTROLS_GROUP]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrlRewind = [[ctrlAutoScrollRewind]] _ctrlGroup;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ctrlSetAutoScrollSpeed]], [[ctrlAutoScrollSpeed]], [[ctrlSetAutoScrollDelay]], [[ctrlAutoScrollDelay]], [[ctrlSetAutoScrollRewind]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>
